levels.description:
This unit gains ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>; Mon3tr gains ATK <@ba.vup>+{attack@atk:0%}</> and attacks all blocked enemies
<@ba.rem>This skill is </><$ba.binding><@ba.rem>Tied</> to Mon3tr</>
